description.value: The swarm strider draws more arthropods from the environment around them to reconstitute some of their damaged body. They regain the listed number of HP, which is typically 5 HP, increasing to 10 at 5th level, 15 at 10th level, and 20 at 15th level. At the GM's discretion, the swarm strider doesn't recover HP in areas where there aren't enough arthropods to call to themselves.
